subcategory.name: Test 1
subcategory.description: The Exotic Heavy Machine Gun, Heir Apparent from Destiny 2. This machine gun acts like a minigun in that it has to be spun up with Mouse 2 before being able to fire. Fully spinning up this weapon will also protect you with an Arc Shield
subcategory.faq: A guide is a manual, a guide that helps a person understand a subject. Usually, guides are dedicated to professional or technical issues. The name comes from the English word guide, which means "direction", "guide", "guide" or "guide".
